TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SelectionRange extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 表示月历控件中的日期选择范围。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>是日期或日期选择上并突出显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。 如果仅选择一个日期后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将为相等。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>可以通过单击某个日期并同时将鼠标指针拖过所需的日期，用户更改或可以在代码中设置范围。 例如，你可能想要让用户为两个输入的日期范围<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件或两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控件和集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>基于这些日期。
## Examples 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件基于为两个输入的两个日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>单击。 此代码假定的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件、 两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上已创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。 你可以考虑添加代码以验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>指派给的文本框中以验证它们是否包含有效的日期。
[!code-cpp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>值设置为`null`时使用此构造函数。
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性，并将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将显示在文本框中。 此示例假定你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CPP/selectionrangeobj.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CS/selectionrangeobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/VB/selectionrangeobj.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange range) cil managed

Docs.summary: 使用指定的选择范围初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>分配属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>所分配的属性值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象。
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性，并将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将显示在文本框中。 此示例假定你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CPP/selectionrangeobj.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CS/selectionrangeobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/VB/selectionrangeobj.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime lower, valuetype System.DateTime upper) cil managed
Public Sub New (lower As DateTime, upper As DateTime)

Docs.summary: 使用指定的起始和结束日期初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > 如果`lower`<xref:System.DateTime>值是否大于`upper`<xref:System.DateTime>值，`lower`值将赋给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件基于为两个输入的两个日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>单击。 此代码假定的新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件、 两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上已创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。 你可以考虑添加代码以验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>指派给的文本框中以验证它们是否包含有效的日期。
[!code-cpp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime End { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.End : DateTime with get, set

Docs.summary: 获取或设置选择范围的结束日期和时间。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性，并将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将显示在文本框中。 此示例假定你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CPP/selectionrangeobj.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CS/selectionrangeobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/VB/selectionrangeobj.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime Start { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };
member this.Start : DateTime with get, set

Docs.summary: 获取或设置选择范围的起始日期和时间。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性，并将分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>对象传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引发事件时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>属性值将显示在文本框中。 此示例假定你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控件。
